amendment.description: Amendment provides $12.5 million in funding for the Federal Flight Deck Officer program (FFDO).
amendment.purpose: An amdendment numbered 10 printed in the Congressional Record to redirect $12,500,000 within Aviation Security for the Federal Flight Deck Officer Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hudson amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hudson amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Hudson.
